original_text: Once you were not a people, but now you are the people of God; once you had not received mercy, but now you have received mercy.
korean_text: 너희가 전에는 백성이 아니더니 이제는 하나님의 백성이요 전에는 긍휼을 얻지 못하였더니 이제는 긍휼을 얻은 자니라

sentences.original_text: Once you were not a people
but now you are the people of God
once you had not received mercy
but now you have received mercy
